document.full_text: world powers sought to revive a faltering gulf-brokered plan on friday to ease yemeni president ali abdullah saleh out of power after months of protests which he has met with violence and defiance.
document.title: world powers push stalled yemen transition plan
lines_and_colors: world powers sought to revive a faltering gulf-brokered plan on friday to ease yemeni president ali abdullah saleh out of power after months of protests which he has met with violence and defiance.
